value: A magical D20 that guarantees only the best of rolls
The holder of this item will always roll perfectly
Chills beverages while held (possible curse: the drink becomes ice)
Pizza slice that regenerates every bite you take (possible curse: its sardine and pineapple)
A coat improving your vision to a full 360 view (possible curse: the eyes make noises when they blink)
Shocks opponent when stabbing (possible curse: also shocks user)
Most expensive item, show off to your friends! (Curse: it's fake/doesn't hatch)
name: shopItems
description: The items available in the shop
